abstract.para: You use the nmcli command to view the status, activity and details of network connections managed by &nm;.

varlistentry.term: View the list of available active connections:

listitem.para: nmcli connection show --active The list of available active network connections appear with the names and UUIDs.

step.para: View the status of all network interfaces:
The real-time updates about the network states and connections appear.
View details of a specific network connection:
Monitor the status of network devices:
The list of all network devices with device name, type, state and connection name appears.
View the signal strength of Wi-Fi connections:
The list of available Wi-Fi networks with SSID, signal strength % and security type appears.
